2017 America’s Cup Yacht Charter

What better way to be a part of this great yachting event than with your own Yacht or Super Yacht charter? Let us help make your America’s Cup Experience the Ultimate Yachting Experience. Roadtrips has access to an exclusive selection of premium charter vessels that will be positioned in Bermuda for the Cup. Charters are available for a portion or full duration according to your needs. Included with each charter is a VIP flag to position you for the best in race viewing plus all the bespoke services you desire.

Contact our office and we can provide you with yacht specifications and let you know current availability.

In addition to all the races of the America’s Cup, you can add some time exploring the beaches and islands that make up this spectacular part of the world. Depending on the size of your group, we can arrange for a variety of sizes of Yachts or Super Yachts and can include VIP dockage or America’s Cup course viewing. It is the perfect option for a great corporate hospitality program or luxury family experience. Your charter can include:

  • All meals
  • On board accommodations
  • Hosted parties for guests
  • VIP dockage
  • VIP flag to access the dedicated VIP area on the race course boundary
  • Access to the America’s Cup parties and events
  • VIP access to Club AC hospitality
  • Access to the pit lane base tour (owner and up to 12 total)
  • Access to the post race press conference
